name: Peteg Elra Nalos VR
description:
Context :

This project was created while studying in enginnering school. It was made with Unity for HTC Vive devices. 

Gameplay :

Equiped with just a camera and a flashlight you must find a way to make the ghost go away.

- The triggers on the controllers will equip the player with either the camera or the flashlight.

- if the camera is equiped a click on the direction pad will take a picture and produce a flash

- If there's nothing hold on the right hand a click on the direction pad will teleport the player.
